text: And did not he make one? Yet had he the residue of the spirit. And wherefore one? That he might seek a godly seed. Therefore take heed to your spirit, and let none deal treacherously against the wife of his youth.2.15 residue: or, excellency2.15 godlyâ€¦: Heb. seed of God2.15 treacherously: or, unfaithfully
